Package com.example.eventapp.admin

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventapp.admin.AdminController
public class AdminController extends Object
AppCompatActivity A controller class is responsible for handling various administrative functions related to users, events, and images. Utilizes Firebase Firestore for database operations.

    • subscribeToUserDB

      public void subscribeToUserDB(UserAdapter adapter)
      Subscribes to real-time updates of the user database in Firestore. Updates the provided UserAdapter with the latest data.
      Parameters:
      adapter - The adapter that needs to be updated with the fetched data.

    • getCurrentUserList

      public void getCurrentUserList(String searchText, boolean queryOrDisplay, UserAdapter userAdapter)
      Fetches and filters the list of users based on the provided search query.
      Parameters:
      searchText - The query to filter the users.
      queryOrDisplay - Indicates whether to perform a search (true) or just display (false).
      userAdapter - The adapter to be updated with filtered results.

    • loadProfileImages

      public void loadProfileImages(UserAdapter userAdapter)
      Loads profile images for users from Firestore.
      Parameters:
      userAdapter - Adapter containing users for which images are to be loaded.

    • deleteUser

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> deleteUser(String userId)

      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A Task representing the result of the delete operation.

    • subscribeToEventDB

      public void subscribeToEventDB(EventAdapter adapter)
      Subscribes to real-time updates from the Events collection in Firestore. Updates provided EventAdapter with current data.
      Parameters:
      adapter - Adapter to be updated with event data.

    • getCurrentEventList

      searchText - Text to filter events.
      queryOrDisplay - Indicates whether to perform a search (true) or just display (false).
      adapter - Adapter to be updated with filtered results.

    • addMockData

      public void addMockData(String randomId)
      Adds mock data for testing purposes. Creates mock users, events, and images with a randomly generated identifier.
      Parameters:
      randomId - Identifier to be used for mock data entries.

    • deleteMockdata

      public void deleteMockdata(String randomId)
      Deletes mock data from Firestore collections based on the provided identifier.
      Parameters:
      randomId - Identifier used for the mock data entries.

    • searchForProfile

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Boolean> searchForProfile(String userId)
      Searches for a profile in the Firestore 'Users' collection based on the given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user to be searched.
      Returns:
      Task indicating whether the profile was found (true) or not (false).

    • searchForEvent

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Boolean> searchForEvent(String eventId)
      Searches for an event in the Firestore 'Events' collection based on the given event ID.
      Parameters:
      eventId - ID of the event to be searched.
      Returns:
      Task indicating whether the event was found (true) or not (false).

    • searchForImage

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Boolean> searchForImage(String imageId)
      Searches for an image in the Firestore 'Images' collection based on the given image ID.
      Parameters:
      imageId - ID of the image to be searched.
      Returns:
      Task indicating whether the image was found (true) or not (false).
